title: Coupling of droplet-on-demand microfluidcs with ESI/MS to study single-cell catalysis
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,25337-25346
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04835K, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Marie van der Loh, Marie Schiffmann, Matthias Polack, Konstantin Wink, Detlev Belder
Glass chips were implemented to facilitate the coupling of a droplet-on-demand system with ESI/MS, thereby enabling the detection of reactions catalysed by a single yeast cell.
